title: Midnight in London
description: Thirty-one year old Ted Mack, the high-school 'geek', was on the cusp of developing the next mega social-network-for-one. His group of techno-philes worked day and night to create a unique computer network that would astonish the world.Twenty-three year old Kevin Moore, Jeremy West's straight roommate from the novel 'Teacher's Pet', has graduated college with honors and is now working on his own creating websites. His idol? Ted Mack.When the two meet during an IT convention in London, the connection between the handsome college jock and the geek is electric. With the chiming of Big Ben signaling the midnight hour in the background, Ted and Kevin kiss, altering their lives from that moment on.Can that one moment in time make a connection that will last a lifetime? Or will their colliding worlds pull them apart?Both Ted and Kevin knew their relationship would not be easy. And if it fell apart? They always had Midnight in London.
author: G.A. Hauser
